item.title: Trump’s move of SPACECOM to Alabama has little to do with national security
item.description: The Pentagon says the move will save money, but acknowledges risk to military readiness.

item.title: A geothermal network in Colorado could help a rural town diversify its economy
item.description: Town pitches companies to take advantage of “reliable, cost-effective heating and cooling."
